Icon in hellfire.exe at CF080 to CF370

Header information which is on top of the extracted icon is located at the end in the exe (The first 16 bytes)

0000010001002020100001000400E802

The next 6 bytes of the extracted icon are either missing in th exe or different

000016000000

The icon starts in the exe with byte 23 of the extracted icon at CF080 :

28000000200000004000000001000400
00000000800200000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000008000

80800000C0C0C000808080000000FF00
